prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The gnomes are equipped with a UV LED light, which causes them to glow in the dark when activated. This feature enhances their visual appeal and functionality in low-light conditions.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Title should be concise and clear
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
